business_definition: Main data structure for daily transaction record with a record length of 350 bytes
Unique identifier for the daily transaction (PIC X(16))
Transaction type code indicating the category or nature of the transaction (PIC X(02))
Transaction category code for classification purposes (PIC 9(04))
Source system or channel from which the transaction originated (PIC X(10))
Detailed description of the transaction (PIC X(100))
Transaction amount with two decimal places, signed numeric field (PIC S9(09)V99)
Unique numeric identifier for the merchant (PIC 9(09))
Name of the merchant where the transaction occurred (PIC X(50))
City location of the merchant (PIC X(50))
Postal zip code of the merchant location (PIC X(10))
Credit or debit card number used for the transaction (PIC X(16))
Original timestamp when the transaction was initiated (PIC X(26))
Processing timestamp when the transaction was processed by the system (PIC X(26))
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
